public class ID3v1Tag

setGenre

public void setGenre(java.lang.String genreVal)
Sets the genreID, id3v1 only supports genres defined in a predefined list so if unable to find value in list set 255, which seems to be the value winamp uses for undefined.

Parameters:
genreVal -

Description copied from class: AbstractTag
